name: FPS training center
description:
Welcome to the FPS training center !

It's an Unity fps project made in 1 week for a school project.

Your goal is to shoot down targets to increase your score but be carefull to not shoot friendly targets because they will make you lose score !

Inputs :

Left Shift : Sprint

Space : Jump

X : Switch fire mode (semi / auto)

R : Reload targets and reset score.

F : Flashlight
